name: Pact of Steel
description:
A WW2 Tower Defense game, with minor aspects of an RTS game. Build up an army to defend your base. Progress throughout the game to get stronger units and strategically change your loadout for each map to get the upper edge on the enemy forces.

Features

  • 10+ playable units
  • Mix of tanks and infantry
  • Many playable maps in different theaters
  • 4 difficulties for all types of players
  • Customizable unit selection
  • Fast-forward for faster gameplay
  • Endless wave options for infinite gameplay
  • Start the next wave early
  • Most units are mobile and can be repositioned
  • Unit pathfinding and shooting on the move
